snippet: Among the records set Sunday, Tom Coughlin became the oldest coach to win the Super Bowl, at age 65.
abstract: Among the records set Sunday, Tom Coughlin became the oldest coach to win the Super Bowl, at age 65.
lead_paragraph: The records set in Super Bowl 46 on Sunday, as compiled by Elias Sports Bureau. Once again, the records reflected the sport's tilt toward the passing game:
